root.name: SBK X: Superbike World Championship
root.description: Legends ModeLegends Mode was a highly anticipated feature of SBK X as it allowed riders from all different eras to be used in the same race. This mode was available in all European copies of the game when purchased new while in the US version it was only available with the Special Edition.Special EditionThis edition of the game came with a poster of Ben Spies and Noriyuki Haga as well as a brief documentary about Ben Spies' remarkable rookie season in which he claimed the championship. It also comes in a steel case featuring Ben Spies leading Haga out of the corner.
